fields.description: Reference to an existing Business Entity Alternate Name Usage. The Usages are supplied by Workday.  Valid values for Supplier are: IRS_1099_RECIPIENT, REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_1. REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_2, REMIT_TO_ADVICE_NAME, REMIT_TO_PAYEE. Valid values for Customer are: REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_1. REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_2, REMIT_TO_ADVICE_NAME, REMIT_TO_PAYEE, BILL_TO_ADDRESSEE_1, BILL_TO_ADDRESSEE_2

Alternate_Name_Usage_Reference.description: Reference to an existing Business Entity Alternate Name Usage. The Usages are supplied by Workday.  Valid values for Supplier are: IRS_1099_RECIPIENT, REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_1. REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_2, REMIT_TO_ADVICE_NAME, REMIT_TO_PAYEE. Valid values for Customer are: REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_1. REMIT_TO_ADDRESSEE_2, REMIT_TO_ADVICE_NAME, REMIT_TO_PAYEE, BILL_TO_ADDRESSEE_1, BILL_TO_ADDRESSEE_2
